title: POLY-PTX Eco Smart flap wheel
description:
Elastic abrasive flap wheel (flap sander) with quick-release mount for removing rust, oxide layers, paint, scratches and for strong structuring and satin finishing of metals.

Features:
- High-quality aluminum oxide fabric for high removal rate and long service life
- Ideal speed: 1,000–2,000 min⁻¹
- Maximum speed: 5,000 min⁻¹
- Eco Smart mount for vibration-free work and 100% concentricity
- Price advantage compared to normal tool holders (no costs for inner core, inner sleeves or cast resin)
